description: Pre-built environment presets parsed from Enviornments.txt. Loading a preset first sends SPWND (clear all) and DL_Int_0, then sends each SPWN command sequentially with 10ms delay between commands.

Default.description: Clear all objects from the world

Office.description: Office environment with desks, shelves, books, plants, water cooler, and floor tiles

Clothing Store.description: Clothing store with racks, hangers, clothing items, dressers, and display areas

CAVE.description: Natural cave environment with rock formations, paths, ferns, and ambient lighting

Sci-Fi Burn Area.description: Sci-fi industrial area with doors, floors, walls, wedges, pipes, wells, and colored volumetric lights

Classroom.description: Full classroom with student desks and chairs, teacher's desk, wallboards, bookshelves, decorations, and overhead lighting

VTuber Room.description: VTuber streaming setup with desk, chair, monitor, ring lights, microphone, backdrop, and floor/wall tiles

notes.loading_sequence: 1) Send SPWND to clear all objects, 2) Send DL_Int_0 to disable directional light, 3) Wait 500ms, 4) Send each SPWN command with 10ms delay
notes.source_file: Enviornments.txt - can be extended by appending new [PresetName] sections with SPWN commands
